availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. Reed (Mason County and Bracken County farmer and town councilman)

body.p: Residence: Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky. A Kentucky born farmer and a Foster, Bracken County town council member. Son of John Reed and Elizabeth Watson. Married Rebecca A. Pollock.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population/Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, 3rd District, Maysville post office,, p. 41.
Find A Grave, "Joseph H H Reed (1832-1864)," Memorial # 94186499, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=94186499&ref=acom (accessed Jul 12, 2017).
